document.full_text: two of the government's most popular programs for the elderly, medicare and social security, will run out of money sooner than thought earlier as a slow-growing economy saps revenues, a report on friday said.
document.title: u.s. says medicare to exhaust funds sooner
lines_and_colors: two of the government's most popular programs for the elderly, medicare and social security, will run out of money sooner than thought earlier as a slow-growing economy saps revenues, a report on friday said.
